name: Delay RSS Feeds
author: Blogger PNG

sections.description:
When you add delay between your live website and your RSS feed, you get a little time window to catch any accidental error on a live website and fix it.

The error could be any grammatical mistake in your article.

RSS feeds are also used by Content Thieves and Content scraping websites. They use it to monitor your website and copy your content and paste it on thier websites or blogs.

Sometimes these content scraping websites beat you in Google search results.

Why to take a chance in search results?

Install Delay RSS Feeds WordPress Plugin.

  • You can check your feed status by going to yourserver.com/feed

You can choose any time unit out of and set its corresponding value:
SECONDS
MINUTES
HOURS
sections.installation:
You can download and install the plugin by any of the 2 mentioned methods:

FIRST METHOD
* Download the plugin from official WordPress repository.
* Extract and upload the contents of the archive to ‘yourserver.com/wp-content/plugins/delay-rss-feeds/’
* Login to your WordPress admin panel and browse to the Plugins section.
* Activate the ‘Delay RSS Feeds’ WordPress Plugin.
* Go to the Settings –> Delay RSS Feeds.
* Enable the plugin.
* Do customizations else leave the default values.

SECOND METHOD
* Install using Plugins –> Add New.
* Activate the ‘Delay RSS Feeds’ WordPress Plugin.
* Go to the Settings –> Delay RSS Feeds.
* Enable the plugin.
* Do customizations else leave the default values.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • This is the first fully-tested stable version of the plugin.

1.1

  • Added Author URI and changed image name. Also, added screenshot inline on wp plugin directory.

1.2

  • Released stable version of the plugin to be compatible with wordpress 5.3.2.

1.3

  • Released stable version of the plugin to be compatible with wordpress 5.6.
